Hero.bigTitle: I build things for the web
Hero.description: I am a full stack developer specialized in building (and occasionally designing) exceptional experiences. Currently, I am focusing on building accessible and it is always my pleasure to contribute my efforts to make your ideas become real

WhaIdo.description: I have a passion for building cool software solutions and that's why I am in the field of Enterprise Software development. I am a strong believer in the fact that everyone should enjoy the work they do! That is why I love software development because I can contribute to making people's work easier, faster and better and hopefully, put a smile on their faces.

AboutMe.titre2: to help your next project or your company
AboutMe.description1: Hello! My name is Faisal and I love creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started in 2018 when I  tried learning programming languages such as (c/c#/python). And after that, I chose to specialize as a web developer. I have a lot of projects a result of choosing this field, you can check both my portfolio and GitHub for more details. I am enthusiastic to work on ambitious projects along with positive people.

Contact.description: My inbox is open 24/7 for any project or opportunity, so feel free to ask me anything you want. I will try my best to answer you .
